projectsInfo.projectTitle: Car Reservation (HTML, CSS, JavaScript(jQuery), JSON Data)
projectsInfo.descriptionText: Scaleable car reservation system, import external JSON type data file and load it into the system. The system allows users to select different types of car, leasing periods and a total price will be displayed after users input all their personal details. Variable also used session and cookies.

projectsInfo.projectTitle: Online Grocery Page (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, SQL)
projectsInfo.descriptionText: An online grocery page displaying items in a tree layout structure. Data of the items were retrieved from the backend using PHP and SQL. Session and cookies were used on the client-side. The shopping cart displays all selections of grocery items. A total price was calculated at the end of the checkout.

education.relevantCourse: Network Management, Cloud computing, SQL Database, Troubleshooting, Website Development and Deployment, IT Management, System Analysis.

education.courseName: Bachelor of Information and Communications Technology
education.relevantCourse: Networking (LAN, wireless, cellular), Database (SQL), Web Technology (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, AJAX, API), Cloud (AWS), Network Security, Computer Graphic, Human Computer Interaction, Operating System Programming, Data Analysis.

workDescrition: Assisting customer with technical enquires, training and implementation projects across multiple custom software applications
Contributing to and developing documentation and case logs.
Providing first class support via phone, email and onsite support to new and established clients.
Manage Jira Service Desk Ticket System, diagnosis and distribute workload across team members based on priority.
Hardware & Peripherals such as Thermal & Laser printers, PDA/PDT devices, switch and route.
Troubleshooting network connectivity issue on printer gateway and other networking devices.
Diagnostic, problem solving skills and to explain to user with non-technical background.
Managed for telecommunication products and services including technical troubleshooting, field hardware support and on-the-phone support; optimized process flows and reduced response time by 10%.
elivered IT support via phone, email, remote desktop (RDP) in mix of helpdesk and onsite support to external clients in a fast-paced environment. Meeting close to 100% of Services Level Agreements.
Analyzed in implementation of new hardware and software with team member to improve workflow and customer service provision, resulting 15% faster deployment time.

Resolved issues related to Windows, network connectivity, software and hardware in a timely manner and documented using keyword in ticket descriptions, improving ability to search records up to 20% faster.
Performed daily back-up checks for local database servers.
Discovered innovative solutions to common and exceptional problems identified on help tickets, reducing searching time by 35% in unusual issues.
Coordinated with senior technicians with complex tasks and time-sensitive achievements to meet client expectations and user needs on an identified schedule, completed ahead of schedule
